data.message: Can I bring Facebook with me on camping trips? What if I need to status update so I can pontificate my adventure with lions and tigers and bears. What about satellites thingamajiggers? Does the magical wave reach me anywhere? Like Siberia? I have a gold iPhone so I don't know if it's compatible with regular ones. Please halp!

replies.message: Sounds like more than just a camping trip, Nate! But don't you worry, we'll be right by your side. -Ryan
Aww thanks Ryan. Your personalized message was so gingerly sweet I almost forgot my message wasn't so concrete. Thanks buddy! You and 2800.....er 2790? Lol

Dude seriously. Facebook will last forever. Just need to improve human condition therefore increase methodologies and ideologies and motive people to strengthen their communities. The newsfeed will get better, likes will have substantial meaning behind them, and together we will conquer the world and bring Facebook to China! Where's my book on mandarin. Jk dude. If only u had time to teach me how to speak
Wheres my Boy Ryan! cell reception is terrible and im not even halphywaay to Seeeberria. Ryan Halp! i need yo uby my side
We're still here, Nate! Safe travels. -Ryan
